meanings.definition: Opponens: a muscle that opposes or resists the action of another muscle
meanings.sent1: The opponens muscle helps to move the thumb away from the palm.
meanings.sent2: During exercise, the opponens muscle works against the flexor muscles.
meanings.sent3: The opponens muscle decided to take a break during the workout!
meanings.sent4: The opponens muscle is like a tiny warrior fighting against the larger muscles.
meanings.sent5: Picture the opponens muscle as a tiny hero standing up to the stronger muscles.

meanings.definition: Opponens: a person who opposes or goes against something
meanings.sent1: She was known as the outspoken opponens of the new policy.
meanings.sent2: The opponens of the project presented their arguments at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The opponens of early mornings finally slept in and missed the sunrise.
meanings.sent4: He stood out as the lone opponens in a sea of supporters.
meanings.sent5: The opponens of change held firm in their beliefs despite pressure.
